doc.title: Yong zhe wu ju
doc.plot: This drama serial focuses on the traditional Chinese self-defence martial art, wushu, as well as the decorative traditional lion dance prominent in Chinese culture. Partially filmed in Beijing, it stars Terence Cao, Chen Tianwen and Zhang Wenxiang as buddies-turned-enemies who finally seek a solution in martial arts. Cynthia Koh is Terence Cao's rich girl love interest, while Fann Wong is another rich girl masquerading incognito in the clan association that Terence Cao works in. Her identity is only discovered in Beijing where the both of them meet.
